item.title: Ba Sidi
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 20 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a double bed, king size). This room is located upstairs with views of the patio, has two single beds and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath of Fez.
item.content:encoded: 20 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a double bed, king size). This room is located upstairs with views of the patio, has two single beds and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath of Fez.

item.title: Jouhara
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 17.50 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a king size double bed). This room is located on the first floor overlooking the Riad’s interiors, has two single beds and a bathroom with a shower decorated in blue zellige of Fez. This room has a connecting door to the Caid suite, is […]
item.content:encoded: 17.50 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a king size double bed). This room is located on the first floor overlooking the Riad’s interiors, has two single beds and a bathroom with a shower decorated in blue zellige of Fez. This room has a connecting door to the Caid suite, is perfect for families with children.
